en: In which language do you want to communicate with me? To stop talking to me at, you can send /cancel at any time.
Are you already teaching or taking classes with us?
Please proceed to the chat with our coordinators.
What is your first name (include middle name if you wish)?
Do you wish to become a student or a teacher?
How old are you? We don't need your exact age, just choose the age group so we can find the best group for you.
Unfortunately, our teachers can only be 18 or more years old. But you can contact our coordinators to see if there are other roles available!
What is your last name (or whatever you want to use instead)?
How did you find out about Samantha Smith's Group?
so that you don't have to give us your phone number. But in this case please make sure you don't change your username while you're with us.
Please provide your phone number in *international format* \(starting with \+ or 00\) or just press the button below to send us your current phone number
Tap to share your phone number
Please provide a valid phone number
What's your timezone? (Choose the correct current time)
What time slots suit you on
What language do you want to learn\? Please note that you can only choose *one* language right now\. You can add a second language later on through our coordinator\.
What language(s) do you want to teach\? Choose *all the languages* and we will ask you about the levels you can teach at the next stage\.
